data.name: Zenbones Demo
data.detailed_description:
Zenbones

A minimal rendition of Mahjong Solitaire.

Features

  • 20 included layouts
  • 30 included backgrounds
  • create your own layouts
data.about_the_game:
Zenbones

A minimal rendition of Mahjong Solitaire.

Features

  • 20 included layouts
  • 30 included backgrounds
  • create your own layouts
data.short_description: A pure version of the traditional tile-matching game. No added flavours.
